inclusion.criterion: Ability of subject to provide an informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Legally Authorized Representative-Adult must provide consent in case the subject is unable to consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of Clostridium difficile disease based on clinical manifestations (change in bowel habits, at least 2 more unformed bowel movements as compared to baseline neurogenic bowel function in the same patient in the 24-hour period prior to randomization)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Lab data (positive polymerase chain reaction test for Clostridium difficile in a stool specimen obtained within 72 hours before randomization)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient has not received antibiotics that are active against Clostridium difficile for any more than 24 hours prior to being screened for this study.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of agents (oral Vancomycin, oral or IV Metronidazole, oral rifamdin, oral bacitracin, or oral fusidic acid) that are active against Clostridium difficile for longer than 24 hours after randomization
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Life-threatening or fulminant Clostridium difficile infection, presence of toxic megacolon, and history of inflammatory bowel disease (Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old woman with recent history of aspiration pneumonia and Clostridium difficile toxin-positive stool samples. She has not received antibiotics active against Clostridium difficile in the past 24 hours.
